client

Interface IRCConfiguration

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IRCConfigurationImpl

    public interface IRCConfiguration

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IRCConfigurationImpl addListener(IRCEventListener listener)
      Adds a listener for the IRCEvents dispatched by the IRCClient.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChannelNames()
      Returns the name of the channels which the client will try/has tried to join.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getChannelPasswords()
      Returns the passwords which the client will use/has used to try to join the channels.
      java.nio.charset.Charset getCharset()
      Returns the charset that will be used by the client.
      java.util.List<IRCEventListener> getListeners()
      Returns the listeners subscribed to the IRCEvents thrown by the client.
      java.lang.String getNickname()
      Returns the nickname which the client will try/has tried to use to connect.
      java.lang.String getPassword()
      Returns the password which the client will use/has used to connect.
      java.lang.String getRealname()
      Returns the realname which the client will use/has used to connect.
      java.lang.String getServer()
      Returns the server to which the client will try/has tried to connect.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Returns the username which the client will use/has used to connect.
      boolean isMultiThread()
      Returns if the eventListeners are handled in different threads.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setCharset(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
      Sets the charset being used by the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setInitialChannels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channels)
      Sets the initial channels of the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setInitialChannels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channels, java.util.List<java.lang.String> passwords)
      Sets the initial channels of the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setMultiThread(boolean isMultiThread)
      Sets the IRCConfiguration for a MultiThread IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
      Sets the nickname of the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setPassword(java.lang.String password)
      Sets the password for the nickname of the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setRealname(java.lang.String realname)
      Sets the realname of the IRCClient.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setServer(java.lang.String server)
      Sets server to which the client will try to connect to.
      IRCConfigurationImpl setUsername(java.lang.String username)
      Sets the username of the IRCClient.

      • setInitialChannels

        IRCConfigurationImpl setInitialChannels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channels)
        Sets the initial channels of the IRCClient.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channels or any channel is null.

      • setInitialChannels

        IRCConfigurationImpl setInitialChannels(java.util.List<java.lang.String> channels,
                                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> passwords)
        Sets the initial channels of the IRCClient.
        Parameters:
        channels - List with the name of the channels to join at start.
        passwords - List with the passwords of the channels to join at start.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If channels or any channels is null, or if channels size is different to passwords size.

      • setCharset

        IRCConfigurationImpl setCharset(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Sets the charset being used by the IRCClient. The default is UTF-8.
        Parameters:
        charset - Charset for the IRCClient.
        Returns:
        this
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If charset is null.
